01457 
01458 /**
01459  * Use a string specification to create an analysis stream.
01460  *
01461  * @param analysis - vector to be filled in with analysis streams.
01462  * @param asFactory - factory for converting strings to streams.
01463  * @param layout - Probeset specifications.
01464  * @param probesetNames - Names probesets in order for chp files
01465  * @param numProbeSets -
01466  */
01467 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::createAnalysisFromSpec(
01468                             std::vector<AnalysisStream *> &analysisStreams,
01469                             AnalysisStreamFactory &asFactory,
01470                             ChipLayout &layout,
01471                             std::vector<const char*> &probesetNames,
01472                             unsigned int numProbeSets) {
01473   // *Warning* People really did a cut and paste number on this
01474   // function and then things have evolved since then, be careful.
01475 
01476   string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
01477   bool writeModels = getOptBool("write-models");
01478   string precompFeatureEff = getOpt("use-feat-eff");
01479   string qMethodSpec = getOpt("qmethod-spec");
01480   vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
01481 
01482   // Create all the analysis paths requested.
01483   vector<string> analysisStrings = getOptVector("analysis");
01484   for(int i = 0; i < analysisStrings.size(); i++) {
01485     AnalysisStream *as = NULL;
01486     if(analysisStrings[i] == "")
01487         Err::errAbort("Invalid (blank) analysis specification");
01488     as = asFactory.constructGTypeAnalysisStream(analysisStrings[i],
01489                                                 layout,
01490                                                 m_stdMethods,
01491                                                 getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
01492     QuantMethod *method = as->getQuantMethod();
01493 
01494     // BRLMM method detected, do stuff
01495     if(InstanceOf(method, QuantBRLMM)) {
01496       QuantBRLMM *qBRLMM = NULL;
01497       qBRLMM =  static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(method);
01498 
01499       if(getOpt("read-models-brlmm") != "") {
01500         qBRLMM->readSnpModels(getOpt("read-models-brlmm"));
01501       }
01502       //
01503       {
01504         string outfile = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName() + ".snp-models");
01505         if (writeModels) {
01506           qBRLMM->setSnpModelOut(outfile,affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01507         }
01508         else if (getOptBool("a5-write-models")) {
01509             if (getOptBool("a5-write-models-use-global")) {
01510                 if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01511                     Err::errAbort("--a5-write-models-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01512                 qBRLMM->m_SnpModelsTsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_a5_global_output_group);
01513             }
01514             qBRLMM->setSnpModelOut(outfile,affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5);
01515         }
01516       }
01517 
01518       // Add quantification method.
01519       QuantMethodFactory factory(QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01520       if(precompFeatureEff != "")
01521         factory.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(layout.getProbeCount(), precompFeatureEff, layout);
01522       QuantExprMethod *eMethod = factory.quantExprMethodForString(qMethodSpec, layout,
01523                                                                   QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01524       // If we want to report allele specific summaries add a reporter for that.
01525       qBRLMM->setQuantExprMethod(eMethod);
01526     } // end of stuff for BRLMM detected
01527 
01528     if(InstanceOf(method, QuantBirdseed)) {
01529       QuantBirdseed *qBirdseed = NULL;
01530       qBirdseed =  static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(method);
01531 
01532       // Add quantification method.
01533       QuantMethodFactory factory(QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01534       if(precompFeatureEff != "")
01535         factory.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(layout.getProbeCount(), precompFeatureEff, layout);
01536       QuantExprMethod *eMethod = factory.quantExprMethodForString(qMethodSpec, layout,
01537                                                                   QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01538       qBirdseed->setQuantExprMethod(eMethod);
01539       qBirdseed->setVerbosity(getOptInt("verbose"));
01540       //
01541       if(writeModels) {
01542         string outfile = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName()+".snp-models.txt");
01543         qBirdseed->setClusterOutFile(outfile);
01544       }
01545       else if (getOptBool("a5-write-models")) {
01546           ///@todo implement models in A5 for birdseed
01547           Err::errAbort("--a5-write-models for birdseed not implemented");
01548       }
01549     } // end of stuff for Birdseed detected
01550 
01551     // LabelZ || LabelZMulti
01552     if(InstanceOf(method, QuantLabelZ)) {
01553       QuantLabelZ *qLabelZ = NULL;
01554       qLabelZ =  static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(method);
01555       
01556       //
01557       if (getOpt("read-models-brlmmp") != "") {
01558         qLabelZ->readSnpPriorMap(getOpt("read-models-brlmmp"));
01559       }
01560       else if (getOptBool("a5-models-input-global") || getOpt("a5-models-input-file") != "") {
01561         string groupName = "/";
01562         string dataName = as->getName() + ".snp-posteriors";
01563         if(getOpt("a5-models-input-name") != "") 
01564             dataName = getOpt("a5-models-input-name");
01565         if(getOpt("a5-models-input-group") != "") 
01566             groupName = getOpt("a5-models-input-group");
01567         else if(getOpt("a5-input-group") != "") 
01568             groupName = getOpt("a5-input-group");
01569         else if(getOpt("a5-group") != "") 
01570             groupName = getOpt("a5-group");
01571     
01572         if (getOptBool("a5-models-input-global")) {
01573             Verbose::out(1,"Loading models from global A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
01574             if(m_a5_global_input_file == NULL)
01575                 Err::errAbort("--a5-models-input-global option given, but no global input file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01576             affx::File5_Group *a5group = m_a5_global_input_file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01577             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = a5group->openTsv(dataName,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01578             qLabelZ->readSnpPriorMap_tsv5(tsv5);
01579             tsv5->close();
01580             Freez(tsv5);
01581             a5group->close();
01582             Freez(a5group);
01583         } else if (getOpt("a5-models-input-file")!="") {
01584             Verbose::out(1,"Loading models from '" + getOpt("a5-models-input-file") + "' A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
01585             affx::File5_File  *a5file = new affx::File5_File();
01586             a5file->open(getOpt("a5-models-input-file"),affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_RO);
01587             affx::File5_Group *a5group = a5file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01588             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = a5group->openTsv(dataName,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01589             qLabelZ->readSnpPriorMap_tsv5(tsv5);
01590             tsv5->close();
01591             Freez(tsv5);
01592             a5group->close();
01593             Freez(a5group);
01594             a5file->close();
01595             Freez(a5file);
01596         }
01597       }
01598       // block for scoping outfile
01599       {
01600         string outfile = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName() + ".snp-posteriors");
01601         if(writeModels) {
01602           qLabelZ->writeSnpPosteriorTsv(outfile,affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01603         }
01604         else if (getOptBool("a5-write-models")) {
01605             if (getOptBool("a5-write-models-use-global")) {
01606                 if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01607                     Err::errAbort("--a5-write-models-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01608                 qLabelZ->m_SnpPosteriorTsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_a5_global_output_group);
01609             }
01610             qLabelZ->writeSnpPosteriorTsv(outfile,affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5);
01611         }
01612       }
01613       // block for scoping outfile
01614       {
01615         string outfile = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName() + ".normalized-summary");
01616         if (getOptBool("summaries")) {
01617           qLabelZ->writeNormSummaryTsv(outfile, celFiles,affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01618         }
01619         else if (getOptBool("a5-summaries")) {
01620             if (getOptBool("a5-summaries-use-global")) {
01621                 if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL) 
01622                     Err::errAbort("--a5-summaries-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01623                 qLabelZ->m_NormSummaryTsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_a5_global_output_group);
01624             } 
01625             qLabelZ->writeNormSummaryTsv(outfile, celFiles,affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5);
01626         }
01627       }
01628       if (getOptBool("select-probes"))
01629         {
01630           string outfile =Fs::join(outDir,as->getName() + ".select-probes");
01631           qLabelZ->writeSnpProbeTsv(outfile,affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01632         }
01633 
01634       // Add quantification method.
01635       QuantMethodFactory factory(QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01636       QuantMethodFactory::setupQuantMethodFactory(
01637             factory,
01638             m_a5_global_input_file,
01639             m_a5_global_input_group,
01640             m_a5_global_output_file,
01641             m_a5_global_output_group,
01642             getOptInt("probe-count"),
01643             getOpt("out-dir"),
01644             getOpt("use-feat-eff"),
01645             getOptBool("a5-feature-effects-input-global"),
01646             getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-file"),
01647             getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-name"),
01648             getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-group"),
01649             getOpt("a5-input-group"),
01650             getOpt("a5-group"),
01651             getOpt("set-analysis-name"),
01652             getOpt("qmethod-spec"),
01653             layout
01654       );
01655       QuantExprMethod *eMethod = factory.quantExprMethodForString(qMethodSpec, layout, QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01656       qLabelZ->setQuantExprMethod(eMethod);
01657     } // end of stuff for LabelZ detected
01658 
01659     analysisStreams.push_back(as);
01660   }
01661 }
01662 
01663 /**
01664  * Get the intial calls from the DmListener and give them to analysis
01665  * methods that need them.
01666  *
01667  * @param layout - Probeset definitions.
01668  * @param dmCaller - Object that does the DM calls.
01669  * @param knownGenotypes - Known genotype object to fill in.
01670  * @param haploidSnps - Snps on chrX.
01671  * @param analysis - Analysis methods to be done.
01672  * @param precompGTypes -
01673  */
01674 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::setInitialCalls(ChipLayout &layout, GenoSeed &seeds,
01675                      std::map<const char *,std::vector<affx::GType>, Util::ltstr > *knownGenotypes,
01676                      std::map<std::string,bool> &haploidSnps,
01677                      std::vector<AnalysisStream *> &analysis,
01678                      std::vector<const char *> toRunProbesets) {
01679 
01680   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
01681   int genotypable_probeset_count = 0;
01682 
01683   // Set the initial calls in DM
01684   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++) {
01685     AnalysisStream *as = analysis[i];
01686     qMethod = as->getQuantMethod();
01687     if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantBRLMM)) {
01688       // Get the initial genotype calls
01689       for(uint32_t i = 0; i < toRunProbesets.size(); i++) {
01690           const char *name = toRunProbesets[i];
01691         ProbeListPacked pList = layout.getProbeListByName(name);
01692         // 
01693         if (pList.isNull()) {
01694           Verbose::warn(1,std::string("ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::setInitialCalls(): missing probeset named: '")+name+"'");
01695           continue;
01696         }
01697         //
01698         if((pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::GenoType && (pList.block_cnt() == 2 || pList.block_cnt() == 4)) || pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::Marker || pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::MultichannelMarker) {
01699             genotypable_probeset_count++;
01700             vector<GType> callVec = seeds.getGenoCalls(name);
01701             (*knownGenotypes)[name] = callVec;
01702         }
01703       }
01704       // Set the known genotypes here.
01705       QuantBRLMM *qBRLMM = NULL;
01706       qBRLMM =  static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod);
01707       qBRLMM->setHaploidSnps(haploidSnps);
01708       qBRLMM->setKnownGenoTypes(*knownGenotypes);
01709       Verbose::out(1, "Setting " + ToStr(knownGenotypes->size()) + " seeds for " + ToStr(toRunProbesets.size()) + " probesets.");
01710     }
01711     else if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)) {
01712       // Get the initial genotype calls
01713       for(uint32_t i = 0; i < toRunProbesets.size(); i++) {
01714         const char *name = toRunProbesets[i];
01715         ProbeListPacked pList = layout.getProbeListByName(name);
01716         // didnt find it.
01717         if (pList.isNull()) {
01718           Verbose::warn(1,std::string("ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::setInitialCalls(): missing probeset named: '")+name+"'");
01719           continue;
01720         }
01721         //
01722         if((pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::GenoType && (pList.block_cnt() == 2 || pList.block_cnt() == 4)) || pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::Marker || pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::MultichannelMarker) {
01723         //if ((pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::GenoType || pList.get_type() == ProbeSet::Marker) && pList.block_cnt() == 2) {
01724             genotypable_probeset_count++;
01725             if (seeds.checkGenoCallsName(name)) {
01726                 vector<GType> callVec = seeds.getGenoCalls(name);
01727                 (*knownGenotypes)[name] = callVec;
01728             }
01729         }
01730       }
01731       // Set the known genotypes here.
01732       QuantLabelZ *qLabelZ = NULL;
01733       qLabelZ = static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod);
01734       qLabelZ->setKnownGenoTypes(knownGenotypes);
01735       Verbose::out(1, "Setting " + ToStr(knownGenotypes->size()) + " seeds for " + ToStr(genotypable_probeset_count) + " genotypable probesets.");
01736     }
01737   }
01738 }
01739 
01740 
01741 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::checkSnpLists(const map<string,bool> &haploidSnps, ChipLayout *layout) {
01742   map<string, bool>::const_iterator hIter, hEnd = haploidSnps.end();
01743   for(hIter = haploidSnps.begin(); hIter != hEnd; hIter++) {
01744     if(!layout->containsProbeSet(hIter->first)) {
01745       Err::errAbort("Can't find snp: '" + hIter->first + "' in cdf file. Wrong chrx file?");
01746     }
01747   }
01748 }
01749 
01750 /**
01751  * When selecting probes to sample from we have a few different things to consider:
01752  * - Are we selecting from a certain type of probeset (i.e. genotyping).
01753  * - Are we selecting from all probesets.
01754  * - are we selecting from a specific list (i.e. --list-sample)
01755  *
01756  * If we're selecting from a specific list then life is easy, just use the list.
01757  * otherwise we have to check to make sure that we're selecting from the right type.
01758  *
01759  * @param toSample - We'll return the list to sample in here.
01760  * @param layout - Layout has information about probesets types.
01761  * @param probesetNames - Names has names of all the probesets.
01762  * @param toRunProbesetNames - This is the list of probesets that will be run.
01763  * @param psTypesToSample - What types of probesets should we be sampling from.
01764  */
01765 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::makeToSampleVector(vector<const char *> &toSample, 
01766                         map<std::string, int> &sampleMap,
01767                         ChipLayout *layout, const vector<const char *> &probesetNames,
01768                         const vector<const char *> &toRunProbesetNames,
01769                         std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> &psTypesToSample) {
01770   int i;
01771   toSample.clear();
01772   sampleMap.clear();
01773   /* if the user specified --list-sample life is easy, just do what they say. */
01774   if(getOptBool("list-sample")) {
01775     toSample = toRunProbesetNames;
01776     for (i = 0; i < toRunProbesetNames.size(); i++) {
01777       sampleMap.insert(make_pair(string(toRunProbesetNames[i]), i));
01778     }
01779   }
01780   else {
01781     std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType>::const_iterator end = psTypesToSample.end();
01782     int pos = 0;
01783     for(i = 0; i < probesetNames.size(); i++) {
01784       bool keep =  psTypesToSample.empty() ||
01785         psTypesToSample.find((affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType)layout->getProbeSetType(i)) != end;
01786       if(keep) {
01787         toSample.push_back(probesetNames[i]);
01788         sampleMap.insert(make_pair(string(probesetNames[i]), pos++));
01789       }
01790     }
01791   }
01792 }
01793 
01794 /**
01795  * Figure out which snps are going to be used for a representation of all snps
01796  *
01797  * @param sampleSize -
01798  * @param layout - Description of chip format.
01799  * @param selectFrom -
01800  * @param SnpSampleNames - Vector to be filled in with pseudo random snp probeset names.
01801  */
01802 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::ObtainSnpSample(
01803                      ChipLayout *layout,
01804                      std::vector<const char *> &selectFrom,
01805                      std::vector<std::string> &SnpSampleNames) {
01806   int sampleSize = getOptInt("prior-size");
01807   vector<const char *> selected; // temporary for selection, no new memory allocated outside of stl
01808   if(sampleSize > selectFrom.size()) {
01809     Verbose::out(2, "Sample size larger than number of probesets. Resetting to: " + ToStr(selectFrom.size()));
01810     sampleSize = selectFrom.size();
01811     setOpt("prior-size", ToStr(sampleSize));
01812   }
01813 
01814   if(sampleSize < 100) {
01815     Verbose::out(1, "Warning!: " + ToStr(sampleSize) +
01816                  " seems like a small number of SNPs to represent all!");
01817   }
01818 
01819   SnpSampleNames.reserve(sampleSize);
01820   selected.resize(sampleSize);
01821   // time. Use the meaning of life, the universe and
01822   // everything...
01823   reproducible_random_sample(selectFrom.begin(), selectFrom.end(),
01824                              selected.begin(), sampleSize, 42);
01825   for(int i = 0; i < selected.size(); i++) {
01826     SnpSampleNames.push_back(selected[i]);
01827   }
01828 }
01829 
01830 /**
01831  * Sort probeset names according to given map
01832  * 
01833  * @param probesetsToSort - vector of probeset names
01834  * @param mapOrder - map of probeset names to relative positions
01835  */
01836 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::sortProbesetsByMapOrder(vector<std::string>::iterator begin, vector<std::string>::iterator end, map<std::string, int> &mapOrder) {
01837   if (begin < end - 1) {
01838     std::vector<std::string>::iterator right = end - 1;
01839     std::vector<std::string>::iterator left = begin;
01840     std::string temp;
01841     int pivot = mapOrder[*right];
01842     
01843     while (left < right) {
01844       while (left < right && mapOrder[*left] <= pivot) {
01845         left++;
01846       }
01847       while (left < right && pivot < mapOrder[*right]) {
01848         right--;
01849       }
01850       
01851       if (left < right) {
01852         temp = *left;
01853         *left = *right;
01854         *right = temp;
01855       }
01856     }
01857     
01858     sortProbesetsByMapOrder(begin, right, mapOrder);
01859     sortProbesetsByMapOrder(left, end, mapOrder);
01860   }  
01861 }
01862 
01863 /**
01864  * Add required reporters to analysis.
01865  *
01866  * @param qMethod - QuantGTypeMethod
01867  * @param as  - AnalysisStream
01868  * @param gender - genders
01869  */
01870 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::addReporters(
01871                   QuantGTypeMethod *qMethod,
01872                   AnalysisStream *as,
01873                   vector<ChipSummary *> &chipSummaries,
01874                   GenderCalls *gender,
01875                   std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToReport,
01876                   SpecialSnpMap &SpecialSnps) {
01877 
01878   AnalysisInfo info = as->getInfo();
01879   bool doCompact = getOptBool("file5-compact");
01880   string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
01881   vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
01882 
01883   // Add Quant Listener to Get Summary Stats
01884   QuantMethodGTypeChipSummary *runSummary = new QuantMethodGTypeChipSummary(qMethod->getType(), gender, SpecialSnps);
01885   as->addReporter(runSummary);
01886 
01887   // Add Expression Summary Stat
01888   QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary *exprSummary = new QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary(qMethod->getType());
01889   qMethod->addExprReporter(exprSummary);
01890 
01891   //// Add Chip Summary Report
01892   // TSV
01893   {
01894     QuantMethodRunReport *runReport = new QuantMethodRunReport(celFiles);
01895     if(getOpt("report-file") != "") {
01896         string dir = Fs::dirname(getOpt("report-file"));
01897         if(dir == "")
01898             dir = outDir;
01899         string name = Fs::basename(getOpt("report-file"));
01900         runReport->setDirPath(dir);
01901         runReport->setFilename(name);
01902     } else {
01903         runReport->setDirPath(outDir);
01904         runReport->setFilename(as->getName()+".report");
01905     }
01906     runReport->setFormat(TsvReport::FMT_TSV); // <-- TSV (!)
01907     //
01908     runReport->registerChipSummary(runSummary);
01909     runReport->registerChipSummary(exprSummary);
01910     for(int i = 0; i<chipSummaries.size(); i++)
01911       runReport->registerChipSummary(chipSummaries[i]);
01912     as->addReporter(runReport);
01913   }
01914 
01915   // Add Text Reporter  (calls & confs)
01916   if (getOptBool("table-output")) {
01917     QuantMethodGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodGTypeReport(getOptBool("output-forced-calls"),getOptBool("output-context"));
01918     // @todo: hack -jhg
01919     reporter->setDirPath(outDir);
01920     reporter->setFilename("QuantMethodGTypeReport-TXT"); // not used -- for debugging.
01921     reporter->setFileprefix(as->getName());
01922     reporter->setFormat(TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01923     //
01924     reporter->setPrecision(5);
01925     //
01926     reporter->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
01927     //
01928     as->addReporter(reporter);
01929   }
01930 
01931   //
01932   if (getOptBool("a5-calls")) {
01933     QuantMethodGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodGTypeReport(getOptBool("output-forced-calls"),getOptBool("output-context"));
01934     reporter->setDirPath(outDir);
01935     reporter->setFileprefix(as->getName());
01936     reporter->setFilename("QuantMethodGTypeReport-A5"); // not used -- for debugging.
01937     if(getOptBool("a5-calls-use-global")) {
01938         if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01939             Err::errAbort("--a5-calls-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01940         reporter->setA5SharedGroup(m_a5_global_output_group);
01941     }
01942     reporter->setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5);
01943     if(doCompact) {
01944       reporter->setCompactFile5Format(info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
01945     }
01946     //
01947     reporter->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
01948     //
01949     as->addReporter(reporter);
01950   }
01951 
01952   // Add AGCC CHP Reporter
01953   if(getOptBool("cc-chp-output")) {
01954       string ccchpDir;
01955       /* If chp directory not specified use  output/cc-chp/ by default. */
01956       if(getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir") == "") {
01957         ccchpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"cc-chp");
01958       }
01959       else {
01960         ccchpDir = getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir");
01961       }
01962       Util::chompLastIfSep(ccchpDir);
01963       QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport *ccchpReporter = new QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport(ccchpDir);
01964       vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
01965       if(resultFiles.size() > 0)
01966           ccchpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
01967       ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(runSummary);
01968       ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(exprSummary);
01969       for(int i = 0; i<chipSummaries.size(); i++)
01970         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(chipSummaries[i]);
01971       as->addReporter(ccchpReporter);
01972   }
01973 
01974   // Add XDA CHP Reporter
01975   if(getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
01976       string chpDir;
01977       /* If chp directory not specified use  output/chp/ by default. */
01978       if (getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir") == "") {
01979         chpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"chp");
01980       }
01981       else {
01982         chpDir = getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir");
01983       }
01984       Util::chompLastIfSep(chpDir);
01985       QuantMethodGTypeCHPReport *chpReporter = new QuantMethodGTypeCHPReport(
01986               info, chpDir, qMethod->getType());
01987       vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
01988       if(resultFiles.size() > 0)
01989           chpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
01990       as->addReporter(chpReporter);
01991   }
01992 /* Avoid compiling these into windows builds until GTC team has been 
01993    informed and given time to update their builds as new libraries are requred. */
01994 #ifndef WIN32
01995   if (getOptBool("sqlite-output")) {
01996     string databaseFile = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName() + ".sqlite");
01997     QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport(databaseFile, "call", "confidence", info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
01998     as->addReporter(reporter);
01999     QuantMethodSqlExprReport *sumReporter = new QuantMethodSqlExprReport(databaseFile + ".summary.db", "summary", info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
02000     sumReporter->addStdHeaders(sumReporter, getOpt("exec-guid"), as->getGuid(), getOpt("time-start"),
02001                                getOpt("command-line"), getOpt("version-to-report"), info);
02002     if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)) {
02003       static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(sumReporter);
02004     } 
02005     else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBRLMM)) {
02006       static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(sumReporter);
02007     } 
02008     else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBirdseed)) {
02009       static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(sumReporter);
02010     }
02011                                                    
02012   }
02013 #endif
02014   // Add txt expression reporter
02015   if (getOptBool("summaries") || getOptBool("feat-effects") || getOptBool("feat-details")) {
02016     addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV,info, qMethod,as,chipSummaries,gender,probeSetsToReport, doCompact);
02017   }
02018   if (getOptBool("a5-summaries") || getOptBool("a5-feature-effects") || getOptBool("a5-feature-details")) {
02019     addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5,info, qMethod,as,chipSummaries,gender,probeSetsToReport, doCompact);
02020   }
02021 }
02022 
02023 /**
02024  * Add required reporters to analysis.
02025  *
02026  * @param qMethod - QuantGTypeMethod
02027  * @param as  - AnalysisStream
02028  * @param gender - genders
02029  */
02030 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::makeReporters(
02031                                                 const std::string &qMethodName,
02032                                                 std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> &reporters,
02033                                                 std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> &exprReporters,
02034                                                 AnalysisInfo &info,
02035                                                 vector<ChipSummary *> &chipSummaries,
02036                                                 GenderCalls *gender,
02037                                                 std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToReport,
02038                                                 SpecialSnpMap &SpecialSnps) {
02039 
02040   bool doCompact = getOptBool("file5-compact");
02041   string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
02042   vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
02043 
02044   // Add Quant Listener to Get Summary Stats
02045   QuantMethodGTypeChipSummary *runSummary = new QuantMethodGTypeChipSummary(qMethodName, gender, SpecialSnps);
02046   reporters.push_back(runSummary);
02047 
02048   // Add Expression Summary Stat
02049   QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary *exprSummary = new QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary(qMethodName);
02050   exprReporters.push_back(exprSummary);
02051 
02052   //// Add Chip Summary Report
02053   // TSV
02054   {
02055     QuantMethodRunReport *runReport = new QuantMethodRunReport(celFiles);
02056     if(getOpt("report-file") != "") {
02057         string dir = Fs::dirname(getOpt("report-file"));
02058         if(dir == "")
02059             dir = outDir;
02060         string name = Fs::basename(getOpt("report-file"));
02061         runReport->setDirPath(dir);
02062         runReport->setFilename(name);
02063     } else {
02064         runReport->setDirPath(outDir);
02065         runReport->setFilename(info.m_AnalysisName+".report");
02066     }
02067     runReport->setFormat(TsvReport::FMT_TSV); // <-- TSV (!)
02068     //
02069     runReport->registerChipSummary(runSummary);
02070     runReport->registerChipSummary(exprSummary);
02071     for(int i = 0; i<chipSummaries.size(); i++)
02072       runReport->registerChipSummary(chipSummaries[i]);
02073     reporters.push_back(runReport);
02074   }
02075 
02076   // Add Text Reporter  (calls & confs)
02077   if (getOptBool("table-output")) {
02078     QuantMethodGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodGTypeReport(getOptBool("output-forced-calls"),getOptBool("output-context"));
02079     // @todo: hack -jhg
02080     reporter->setDirPath(outDir);
02081     reporter->setFilename("QuantMethodGTypeReport-TXT"); // not used -- for debugging.
02082     reporter->setFileprefix(info.m_AnalysisName);
02083     reporter->setFormat(TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
02084     //
02085     reporter->setPrecision(5);
02086     //
02087     reporter->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
02088     //
02089     reporters.push_back(reporter);
02090   }
02091 
02092   //
02093   if (getOptBool("a5-calls")) {
02094     QuantMethodGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodGTypeReport(getOptBool("output-forced-calls"),getOptBool("output-context"));
02095     reporter->setDirPath(outDir);
02096     reporter->setFileprefix(info.m_AnalysisName);
02097     reporter->setFilename("QuantMethodGTypeReport-A5"); // not used -- for debugging.
02098     if(getOptBool("a5-calls-use-global")) {
02099         if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02100             Err::errAbort("--a5-calls-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02101         reporter->setA5SharedGroup(m_a5_global_output_group);
02102     }
02103     reporter->setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5);
02104     if(doCompact) {
02105       reporter->setCompactFile5Format(info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
02106     }
02107     //
02108     reporter->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
02109     //
02110     reporters.push_back(reporter);
02111   }
02112 
02113   // Add AGCC CHP Reporter
02114   if(getOptBool("cc-chp-output")) {
02115       string ccchpDir;
02116       /* If chp directory not specified use  output/cc-chp/ by default. */
02117       if (getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir") == "") {
02118         ccchpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"cc-chp");
02119       }
02120       else {
02121         ccchpDir = getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir");
02122       }
02123       Util::chompLastIfSep(ccchpDir);
02124       QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport *ccchpReporter = new QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport(ccchpDir);
02125       vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
02126       if(resultFiles.size() > 0)
02127           ccchpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
02128       ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(runSummary);
02129       ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(exprSummary);
02130       for(int i = 0; i<chipSummaries.size(); i++)
02131         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(chipSummaries[i]);
02132       reporters.push_back(ccchpReporter);
02133   }
02134 
02135   // Add XDA CHP Reporter
02136   if(getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
02137       string chpDir;
02138       /* If chp directory not specified use  output/chp/ by default. */
02139       if(getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir") == "")
02140         chpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"chp");
02141       else
02142         chpDir = getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir");
02143       Util::chompLastIfSep(chpDir);
02144       QuantMethodGTypeCHPReport *chpReporter = new QuantMethodGTypeCHPReport(
02145               info, chpDir, qMethodName);
02146       vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
02147       if(resultFiles.size() > 0)
02148           chpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
02149       reporters.push_back(chpReporter);
02150   }
02151 /* Avoid compiling these into windows builds until GTC team has been 
02152    informed and given time to update their builds as new libraries are requred. */
02153 #ifndef WIN32
02154   if(getOptBool("sqlite-output")) {
02155     string databaseFile = Fs::join(outDir,info.m_AnalysisName+".sqlite");
02156     QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport *reporter = new QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport(databaseFile, "call", "confidence", info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
02157     reporters.push_back(reporter);
02158     QuantMethodSqlExprReport *sumReporter = new QuantMethodSqlExprReport(databaseFile + ".summary.db", "summary", info.m_MaxPsNameLength);
02159     sumReporter->addStdHeaders(sumReporter, getOpt("exec-guid"), info.m_AnalysisGuid, getOpt("time-start"),
02160                                getOpt("command-line"), getOpt("version-to-report"), info);
02161     exprReporters.push_back(sumReporter);
02162   }
02163 #endif
02164   // Add txt expression reporter
02165   if (getOptBool("summaries") || getOptBool("feat-effects") || getOptBool("feat-details")) {
02166     addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV,info, exprReporters,chipSummaries,gender,probeSetsToReport, doCompact);
02167   }
02168   if (getOptBool("a5-summaries") || getOptBool("a5-feature-effects") || getOptBool("a5-feature-details")) {
02169     addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5,info, exprReporters,chipSummaries,gender,probeSetsToReport, doCompact);
02170   }
02171 }

02173 
02174 /**
02175  * Any methods that must have seed genotype calls?  BRLMM
02176  *
02177  * @param analysis - which methods are called
02178  */
02179 int ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::DetectNeedForSeeds(vector<AnalysisStream *> analysis)
02180 {
02181   int needSeeds=0;
02182   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
02183   for(unsigned int asIx = 0; asIx < analysis.size(); asIx++) {
02184     AnalysisStream *as = analysis[asIx];
02185     qMethod = as->getQuantMethod();
02186     if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantBRLMM))
02187       needSeeds = 1;
02188   }
02189   return(needSeeds);
02190 }
02191 
02192 
02193 /**
02194  *  Guess what: does setup for analysis methods first time through the loop
02195  *  gets samples of snps for various purposes
02196  *  calls genders
02197  *  builds priors, normalization functions
02198  *
02199  * @param analysis - what methods need setting up
02200  * @param layout - this particular subset of the chip
02201  * @param iMart - intensities from cel files
02202  * @param priorSnpNames - names of snp sample for prior (BRLMM)
02203  * @param normSnpNames - names of snps sampled for normalization (LabelZ = BRLMM-p)
02204  * @param fileNames - names of celfiles
02205  * @param genders - genders to pass to quant methods
02206  * @param inbred - sample covariate to pass to quant methods, like genders
02207  * @param haploidSnps - chrX snps which get special treatment
02208  * @param specialSnps -
02209  */
02210 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::DoSetup(std::vector<AnalysisStream *> &analysis,
02211              ChipLayout &layout,
02212              IntensityMart &iMart,
02213 //              IntensityMart &priorIntensityMart,
02214 //              IntensityMart &normIntensityMart,
02215              vector<string> &priorSnpNames,
02216              vector<string> &normSnpNames,
02217              vector<string> &fileNames,
02218              GenderCalls *genders,
02219              InbredStatus *inbred,
02220              map<string,bool> &haploidSnps,
02221              SpecialSnpMap &SpecialSnps,
02222              CopyNumberMap &copyNumberMap,
02223              vector<ChipSummary *> &chipSummaries,
02224              const vector<const char *> &probesetNames,
02225              std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToReport) {
02226 
02227   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
02228 
02229   string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
02230   vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
02231 
02232   // refactor out the hack that sets up everything
02233   // now deal with the setup for streams
02234   // including learning about samples/snps
02235 
02236   for(unsigned int asIx = 0; asIx < analysis.size(); asIx++) {
02237     AnalysisStream *as = analysis[asIx];
02238     qMethod = as->getQuantMethod();
02239 
02240     AnalysisInfo info = makeAnalysisInfo(as, layout, probesetNames, genders);
02241     as->setInfo(info);
02242 
02243     // If we are learning a prior this is the time to do it.
02244     vector<affx::Gender> genderVec = genders->getGenders();
02245     vector<double> inbredVec = inbred->getInbredStatus();
02246 
02247     // if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantBRLMM)) {
02248     //   QuantBRLMM *qBRLMM = NULL;
02249     //   qBRLMM =  static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod);
02250     //   qBRLMM->setGenders(genderVec);
02251     //   qBRLMM->setHaploidSnps(haploidSnps);
02252     //   /// @todo refactor dmCallsOut out of QuantBRLMM and into engine
02253     //   if(getOptBool("dm-out")) {
02254     //     qBRLMM->setDmCallsOut(outDir + PATH_SEPARATOR + "dm.calls", celFiles);
02255     //   }
02256     //   addReporters(qBRLMM, as, chipSummaries, genders, probeSetsToReport);
02257     //   string outPrefix = outDir + PATH_SEPARATOR + ToStr(as->getName()) + ".prior.txt";
02258     //   setPrior(outPrefix, priorSnpNames, layout, iMart,
02259     //            *(as->getChipStream()), *(as->getPmAdjuster()), qBRLMM);
02260 
02261     // } // end BRLMM detected
02262 
02263     // if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantBirdseed)) {
02264     //   QuantBirdseed *qBirdseed = NULL;
02265     //   qBirdseed =  static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod);
02266     //   qBirdseed->setGenders(genderVec);
02267     //   addReporters(qBirdseed, as, chipSummaries, genders, probeSetsToReport);
02268     // } // end Birdseed detected
02269     
02270     //  Note that QuantLabelZMulti will also satisfy the "InstanceOf" check on next line.
02271     if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)){
02272       QuantLabelZ *qLabelZ = NULL;
02273       qLabelZ = static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod);
02274       // just report QC output
02275       if (!SpecialSnps.empty())
02276           qLabelZ->setSpecialSnps(SpecialSnps);
02277       if(!haploidSnps.empty())
02278         qLabelZ->setHaploidSnps(haploidSnps);
02279       qLabelZ->setGenders(genderVec);
02280       // add sample covariate inbreeding penalty here
02281       // this is highly indirect at this point, but perhaps there's a general model for sample covariates
02282       qLabelZ->setInbredHetPenalty(inbredVec);
02283       // send genders to the summary reporter for all chip files
02284       addReporters(qLabelZ, as, chipSummaries, genders, probeSetsToReport, SpecialSnps);
02285       // set normalization if required
02286       // that is, precompute the normalization parameters based on
02287       // covariates for each sample
02288       string outPrefix = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName()+".norm.txt");
02289       if (getOptInt("norm-size")>0)
02290         setNormLabelZ(outPrefix, normSnpNames, layout, iMart,
02291                       *(as->getChipStream()), *(as->getPmAdjuster()), qLabelZ);
02292 
02293     } // end labelZ detected
02294 
02295     // QuantLabelZMulti already partially set as it is also a QuantLabelZ
02296     if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZMulti)){
02297       QuantLabelZMulti *qLabelZMulti = NULL;
02298       qLabelZMulti = dynamic_cast<QuantLabelZMulti *>(qMethod);
02299       ///@todo we should really make this generic to all QuantMethods
02300       qLabelZMulti->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
02301       if(!copyNumberMap.empty()) 
02302         qLabelZMulti->setCopyNumberMap(copyNumberMap);
02303     }
02304 
02305     as->addStdHeaders(getOpt("exec-guid"),
02306                       getOpt("time-start"),
02307                       getOpt("command-line"),
02308                       getOpt("version-to-report"),
02309                       info);
02310     // this opens the file
02311     as->prepare(iMart);
02312   }
02313 }
02314 
02315 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::setIterationData(ChipLayout &layout, 
02316                       vector<AnalysisStream *> &analysis,
02317                       vector<string> &priorSnpNames, vector<string> &normSnpNames,
02318                       vector<const char *> &toRunProbesets,
02319                       SpecialSnpMap &specialSnps) {
02320   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
02321   // Set the initial data that doesn't need seeds
02322   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++) {
02323     AnalysisStream *as = analysis[i];
02324     qMethod = as->getQuantMethod();
02325     if(InstanceOf(qMethod, QuantBirdseed)) {
02326       QuantBirdseed *qBirdseed = NULL;
02327       qBirdseed =  static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod);
02328       // Load up just the probeset priors we need for this iteration.
02329       if(getOpt("read-models-birdseed") != "") {
02330         set<const char *, Util::ltstr> toLoad;
02331         for(int i = 0; i < priorSnpNames.size(); i++) {
02332           toLoad.insert(priorSnpNames[i].c_str());
02333         }
02334         for(int i = 0; i < normSnpNames.size(); i++) {
02335           toLoad.insert(normSnpNames[i].c_str());
02336         }
02337         // Always need to load up the snps to be processed this time through.
02338         for(int i = 0; i < toRunProbesets.size(); i++) {
02339           toLoad.insert(toRunProbesets[i]);
02340         }
02341         qBirdseed->setPriorFile(getOpt("read-models-birdseed"), getOpt("chip-type"), &toLoad, specialSnps);
02342       }
02343     }
02344   }
02345 }
02346 
02347 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::fillInDesiredOrder(std::vector<int> &desiredOrder) {
02348     vector<bool> probeSeen(m_ChipLayout->getProbeCount(), false);
02349     int psCount = m_ChipLayout->getProbeSetCount();
02350     APT_ERR_ASSERT(psCount > 0, "Must have positive number of probesets to count.");
02351     // @todo - this should be a function rather than inline...
02352     for(int i = 0; i < psCount ; i++) {
02353         ProbeListPacked pl = m_ChipLayout->getProbeListAtIndex(i);
02354         if (!pl.isNull()) {
02355             for(int pIx = 0; pIx < pl.probe_cnt(); pIx++) {
02356                 if(!probeSeen[pl.get_probeId(pIx)]) {
02357                     desiredOrder.push_back(pl.get_probeId(pIx));
02358                     probeSeen[pl.get_probeId(pIx)]  = true;
02359                 }
02360             }
02361         }
02362     }
02363     
02364     for (int i = 0; i < probeSeen.size(); i++) {
02365         if (!probeSeen[i]) {
02366             desiredOrder.push_back(i);
02367         } 
02368     }
02369 
02370 }
02371 
02372 void  ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::fillInSelectedGenders(GenderCalls **selectedGenders, 
02373                                                          std::string &analysisName, 
02374                                                          std::map<std::string, GenderCalls *> &genderCallsMap,
02375                                                          NoGenderCalls *noGenderCalls) {
02376 
02377     if(analysisName.find("birdseed-v2") != string::npos || analysisName.find("birdseed-dev") != string::npos) {
02378         if(genderCallsMap.find("cn-probe-chrXY-ratio")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02379             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["cn-probe-chrXY-ratio"];
02380         } else if(genderCallsMap.find("em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02381             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast"];
02382         }
02383     } 
02384     else if(analysisName.find("birdseed") != string::npos) {
02385         if(genderCallsMap.find("em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02386             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast"];
02387         }
02388     }  
02389     else if(analysisName.find("brlmm-p") != string::npos) {
02390         if(genderCallsMap.find("cn-probe-chrXY-ratio")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02391             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["cn-probe-chrXY-ratio"];
02392         } else if(genderCallsMap.find("em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02393             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["em-cluster-chrX-het-contrast"];
02394         }
02395     }
02396     else if(analysisName.find("brlmm") != string::npos) {
02397         if(genderCallsMap.find("dm-chrX-het-rate")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02398             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["dm-chrX-het-rate"];
02399         } else if(genderCallsMap.find("supplied-genotypes-chrX-het-rate")!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02400             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap["supplied-genotypes-chrX-het-rate"];
02401         }
02402     }
02403     
02404     // user specified gender method trumps all
02405     string genderMethod = getOpt("set-gender-method");
02406     if(genderMethod != "") {
02407         if(genderMethod == "none") {
02408             *selectedGenders = noGenderCalls;
02409         } else if(genderCallsMap.find(genderMethod)!=genderCallsMap.end()) {
02410             *selectedGenders = genderCallsMap[genderMethod];
02411         } else {
02412             Err::errAbort("No " + genderMethod + " genders to use, but " + genderMethod + " genders requested with --gender-method.");
02413         }
02414     }
02415 
02416 }
02417 
02418 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::fillInChipLayout() {
02419     std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> psTypesToLoad; // What types of probesets are we interested in analyzing.
02420     probeidmap_t killList;                 // Probes in cdf that we don't want to use.
02421     colrow_t numRows = Convert::toUnsignedInt(getOpt("num-rows"));
02422     colrow_t numCols = Convert::toUnsignedInt(getOpt("num-cols"));
02423     if(m_FreeChipLayout) {
02424         
02425         // Does the user want to toss out some probes?
02426         if(getOpt("kill-list") != "") {
02427             ChipLayout::fillInKillList(getOpt("kill-list"), killList, numRows, numCols);
02428         }
02429         if(!getOptBool("all-types")) {
02430             psTypesToLoad.insert(affxcdf::MarkerProbeSetType);
02431             psTypesToLoad.insert(affxcdf::GenotypingProbeSetType);
02432             psTypesToLoad.insert(affxcdf::MultichannelMarkerProbeSetType);
02433         }
02434         
02435         Freez(m_ChipLayout);
02436         m_ChipLayout = new ChipLayout;
02437         m_ChipLayout->setNeedMismatch(getOptBool("need-mismatch"));
02438         m_ChipLayout->setNeedGc(getOptBool("need-gc"));
02439         m_ChipLayout->setNeedPmAlleleMatch(getOptBool("need-allelematch"));
02440         
02441         loadLayout(  *m_ChipLayout, 
02442                      m_ProbesetNames,    // filled in and used later
02443                      killList, 
02444                      false, 
02445                      psTypesToLoad
02446                      );
02447     }
02448 }
02449 
02450 /**
02451    This is the "main()" equivalent of the engine. This function has
02452    two main phases: 1) Creation an initialization of AnalysisStream
02453    and associated objects. 2) Looping through the list of cdf
02454    probesets to do the genotyping calls.
02455 
02456    Phase 2 is definitely where most of the time and cpu cycles are
02457    spent. The list of things that happens for each iteration of phase
02458    2 is:
02459    - Read in cel files only keeping data needed for current iteration in RAM.
02460    - While reading cel files make DM calls.
02461    - Once cel files are read loop through probesets making BRLMM genotype
02462    calls.
02463 
02464    Special things that happen in the first iteration of phase 2:
02465    - Calculate prior if desired.
02466    - Determine gender using DM calls if desired.
02467    - Learn chipstream parameters necessary.
02468    - Attach any reporters to the analysis streams.
02469 
02470    Top of the call stack... This function is getting to be a real
02471    beast, time for some refactoring...
02472 */
02473 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::runImp() {
02474   // *Warning* This function has evolved into quite a behemoth with a
02475   // series of feature requests and no time to refactor it, be
02476   // careful with modifications.
02477   // probeset names act as a common pool for a number of different
02478   // things so we don't have to copy the relatively large (in RAM)
02479   // probe names over and over. They are known to be used for the
02480   // chp file writers, meta probesets, and prior selection but may
02481   // also be used for other things as time goes on. Change or delete
02482   // them prematurely at your own risk.
02483   std::vector<const char *> toRunProbesets; /// names of probesets to compute/process
02484   bool needPrior = true;                 // Are we computing a prior or is it being read from file?
02485   vector<string> priorSnpNames;          // Names of snps that will be used to estimate prior.
02486   //  bool needNorm = false;                 // are we computing norm? - this variable is not used?
02487   vector<string> normSnpNames;           // Names of snps that will be used to estimate normalizers.
02488   IntensityMart *iMart = NULL;
02489   map<string,bool> haploidSnps;          // chrx snps, used for gender and estimated with different model
02490   SpecialSnpMap SpecialSnps;             // all special snps
02491   CopyNumberMap copyNumberMap;           // A map of names of markers to a vector of copy Numbers, indexed by sample. 
02492   std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> psTypesToLoad; // What types of probesets are we interested in analyzing.
02493   std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> psTypesToSample; // What types of probesets are we interested in sampling.
02494   CelStatListener *celStats = NULL;
02495   std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> probeSetsToReport; // Probe sets to report on
02496 
02497   // seed and gender stuff
02498   //  GenoSeed *seeds = NULL;                // The seed genotypes to use for determining gender and seeding brlmm
02499   GenoSeedTxt *precompSeeds = NULL;      // Precomputed seeds that were read in.
02500   DmListener *dmCaller = NULL;
02501 
02502   // gender stuff
02503   map<string, GenderCalls *> genderCallsMap; /// Map of gender call methods available
02504   FileGenders *fileGenderReader = NULL;
02505   EmGenderCelListener *emCelListener = NULL;
02506   CnProbeGenderCelListener *cnProbeCelListener = NULL;
02507   NoGenderCalls *noGenderCalls = NULL;
02508 
02509   // inbred sample covariate stuff
02510   map<string, InbredStatus *> InbredMap; /// Map of Inbred status methods [only one currently, but who knows?]
02511   //  FileInbred *fileInbredReader = NULL;
02512   NoInbredStatus *noInbredReader = NULL;
02513   CelReader reader;
02514   PsBoard *board = new PsBoard(); 
02515   board->setOptions(this);
02516   // make this all one big try catch to make sure destructors are
02517   // called if exceptions thrown.
02518   try { // outer try for handling the exception.
02519     try { // inner try for memory clean up.
02520         vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
02521         vector<string> analysisStrings = getOptVector("analysis");
02522 
02523         // set up null covariates in case nothing is supplied
02524         // sample covariates: gender, inbreeding status
02525         noGenderCalls = new NoGenderCalls(celFiles.size());
02526         noInbredReader = new NoInbredStatus(celFiles.size());
02527 
02528         // mem tracking stuff
02529         std::vector<ChipSummary *> chipSummaries(0);  // ChipSummaries to add to reporters
02530 
02531         Verbose::out(1, "Beginning analysis of " + ToStr(celFiles.size()) + " cel files.");
02532 
02533         /* Are we doing a subset of all the probe sets? */
02534         string psListFile = getOpt("probeset-ids");
02535         string readPriorsBrlmm = getOpt("read-priors-brlmm");
02536         //        int computePrior = getOptInt("prior-size");
02537         //        bool listSample = getOptBool("list-sample");
02538         /* Are we only reporting a subset of those processed */
02539         string psReportListFile = getOpt("probeset-ids-reported");
02540 
02541         // read in the layout of probesets on the chip.
02542         fillInChipLayout(); // Fills in m_ChipLayout and m_ProbesetNames
02543 
02544         vector<string> fileNames = celFiles;
02545         board->set("chiplayout", m_ChipLayout);
02546         // Load up marker by sample specific cn info
02547         string genotype_markers_cn_file = getOpt("genotype-markers-cn-file");
02548         if(genotype_markers_cn_file != "") {
02549             readCopyNumberFile(copyNumberMap, genotype_markers_cn_file);
02550         }
02551 
02552         // We need to handle chrX snps separately for some algorithms, read in those snps if specified.
02553         // special snps trumps chrX snps specification
02554         if (getOpt("special-snps") != ""){
02555             fillInSpecialSnps(SpecialSnps, *m_ChipLayout, true);
02556             haploidFromSpecial(SpecialSnps,haploidSnps);
02557         }        if(getOpt("chrX-probes") != "") { // @todo
02558             /// @todo should we require a minimum number of X and Y probes?
02559             cnProbeCelListener = new CnProbeGenderCelListener(getOpt("chrX-probes"), getOpt("chrY-probes"), 
02560                                                               getOptDouble("female-thresh"), getOptDouble("male-thresh"));
02561             reader.registerCelListener(cnProbeCelListener);
02562             chipSummaries.push_back(cnProbeCelListener);
02563             genderCallsMap[cnProbeCelListener->getGenderName()] = cnProbeCelListener;
02564         }
02565 
02566         needPrior = false;
02567         string diskDir = getOpt("temp-dir");
02568 
02569         // @todo refactor create DataStore here...
02570         std::map<const char *,std::vector<affx::GType>, Util::ltstr > knownGenotypes;
02571         map<string,bool>::iterator start, end = haploidSnps.end();
02572         vector<ProbeListPacked> haploidProbeSets;
02573         for(start = haploidSnps.begin(); start != end; start++) {
02574             ProbeListPacked ps = m_ChipLayout->getProbeListByName(start->first);
02575             if(!ps.isNull()) {
02576               haploidProbeSets.push_back(ps);
02577             }
02578             //else
02579                 // Verbose::out(1,"Unable to find probeset " + start->first + " in layout for haploidSnps. Ignoring.");
02580         }
02581         if(!haploidProbeSets.empty()) {
02582             /// @todo is 1 enough? probably not, should we require a minimum
02583             /// number of haploid probe sets?
02584 
02585             // Hack to turn this off for DMET_Plus
02586             if(getOptBool("em-gender")) {
02587                 emCelListener = new EmGenderCelListener(haploidProbeSets);
02588                 reader.registerCelListener(emCelListener);
02589                 chipSummaries.push_back(emCelListener);
02590                 genderCallsMap[emCelListener->getGenderName()] = emCelListener;
02591             }
02592         }
02593 
02594         // @todo refactor 
02595         // 1) Add multiple channels for datastore
02596         // 2) Add feature effects for multiple channels
02597         // 3) SpfFile v4 reading and writing
02598         // 4) Freez layout and work off disk...
02599         // @todo refactor - setup data store here...
02600         Verbose::out(2, "Reading cel files.");
02601         DataStore *dStore = NULL;
02602         int stageIx = 0; 
02603         TmpFileFactory tmpFactory;
02604         tmpFactory.setTmpdir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
02605         // string stageTemp = tmpFactory.genFilename_basic(ToStr("stage-") + ToStr(stageIx), ".a5"); 
02606         string stageTemp = Fs::join(diskDir,ToStr("stage-") + ToStr(stageIx) + "-temp.a5");
02607         dStore = new DataStore(stageTemp);
02608 
02609         vector<int> desiredOrder;
02610         fillInDesiredOrder(desiredOrder);
02611 
02612         dStore->setProbeOrder(desiredOrder);
02613       //  string probeInfoTemp = tmpFactory.genFilename_basic(ToStr("stage-probe-info") + ToStr(stageIx), ".a5");
02614         string probeInfoTemp = Fs::join(diskDir,"stage-probe-info-temp.a5"); 
02615         DataStore probeInfo(probeInfoTemp);
02616         probeInfo.setProbeOrder(desiredOrder);
02617         probeInfo.setValues(*m_ChipLayout, *board);
02618         board->setProbeInfo(&probeInfo);
02619          
02620         reader.setFiles(celFiles);
02621         reader.registerCelListener(dStore);
02622         reader.readFiles();
02623 
02624         // Null covariate first
02625         InbredStatus *selectedInbred = noInbredReader;
02626         GenderCalls *selectedGenders = noGenderCalls;        
02627 
02628         
02629         string analysisString = getOpt("analysis");
02630         vector<AnalysisStage> stages = AnalysisStage::makeStages(analysisString, m_stdMethods);
02631         string analysisName =  getOpt("set-analysis-name");
02632         if (analysisName.empty()) {
02633             if(m_stdMethods.find(analysisString) != m_stdMethods.end()) {
02634                 analysisName = analysisString;
02635             }
02636             else {
02637                 analysisName = stages[0].name;
02638                 for(int i = 1; i < stages.size(); i++) {
02639                     analysisName = analysisName + "." + stages[i].name;
02640                 }
02641             }
02642         }
02643         
02644         fillInSelectedGenders(&selectedGenders, analysisName, genderCallsMap, noGenderCalls);
02645 
02646         Verbose::out(1,"Using gender method " + selectedGenders->getGenderName() + " for genotype calling.");
02647         Verbose::out(1,"Using inbred covariates " + selectedInbred->getInbredName() + " for genotype calling.");
02648 
02649         // @todo refactor - setup blackboard calls, genders, etc.
02650         GenotypeInfo gInfo;
02651         gInfo.m_Genders = selectedGenders;
02652         gInfo.m_Inbred = selectedInbred;
02653         gInfo.m_HaploidSnps = &haploidSnps;
02654         gInfo.m_SpecialSnps = &SpecialSnps;
02655         gInfo.m_CopyNumberMap = &copyNumberMap;
02656         board->setGenotypeInfo(&gInfo);
02657 
02658         AnalysisInfo info = makeAnalysisInfo(*m_ChipLayout, toRunProbesets, selectedGenders, analysisName);
02659         //unsigned int dotMod = max(int(toRunProbesets.size()/40), 1);
02660 
02661         board->setAnalysisInfo(&info);
02662         DTFactory dtFactory;
02663 
02664         std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> reporters;
02665         std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> exprReporters;
02666         makeReporters(stages[stages.size() - 1].name, reporters, exprReporters, info, chipSummaries, selectedGenders, NULL, SpecialSnps);
02667         board->setQuantGTypeReporters(&reporters);
02668         board->setQuantExpressionReporters(&exprReporters);
02669         Verbose::out(1,"Preprocessing cel file data");
02670         for(int i = 0; i < stages.size(); i++) {
02671 
02672           Verbose::out(1, "Doing stage: " + ToStr(i) + " " + stages[i].name);
02673           time_t startTime = time(NULL);
02674           //string nextStore = tmpFactory.genFilename_basic(ToStr("stage-") + ToStr(++stageIx), ".a5"); 
02675           string nextStore = Fs::join(diskDir,ToStr("stage-") + ToStr(++stageIx) + "-temp.a5");
02676           DataStore *out = new DataStore(nextStore);
02677           out->initFromDataStore(*dStore);
02678           //          runChipStreamStage(stages[i], *board, *dStore, *out);
02679           DataTransform *transform = dtFactory.dataTransformForString(stages[i].spec, *board);
02680           bool updated = transform->transformData(*board, *dStore, *out);
02681           Freez(transform);
02682           if (updated) {
02683             DataStore *toFree = dStore;
02684             dStore = out;
02685             Freez(toFree);
02686           }
02687           else {
02688             Freez(out);
02689           }
02690           time_t endTime = time(NULL);
02691           int t = int(  (float)(endTime - startTime) / 60.0 * 100); // convert to minutes
02692           Verbose::out(1, "Stage finished (" + ToStr((float)t/100) + " min)");
02693         }
02694         Verbose::out(1,"Done Preprocessing cel file data");
02695         if (!getOpt("db-from-prior-models").empty()) {
02696             SnpModelConverter conv;
02697             if (!getOpt("read-models-brlmmp").empty()) {
02698                 conv.convertToDbModel(getOpt("read-models-brlmmp"), getOpt("db-from-prior-models"));
02699             }
02700             else if (!getOpt("read-models-birdseed").empty()) {
02701                 conv.convertToDbModel(getOpt("read-models-birdseed"), getOpt("db-from-prior-models"));
02702             }
02703         }
02704         if (!getOpt("db-from-posterior-models").empty()) {
02705             SnpModelConverter conv;
02706             string input;
02707             board->get("model-file-written", &input);
02708             string file5Name = analysisName + ".snp-posteriors";
02709             conv.convertToDbModel(input, getOpt("db-from-posterior-models"), file5Name);
02710         }
02711         // Tell analyses that we are done computing.
02712         Freez(dStore);
02713     } // inner try end
02714     catch (...) {
02715       // cleanup -- KEEP IN SYNC WITH MEMORY FREEZ BELOW WHEN NO EXCEPTION
02716       ///@todo leaking probeSetToReport
02717       Freez(precompSeeds);
02718       Freez(dmCaller);
02719       Freez(emCelListener);
02720       Freez(cnProbeCelListener);
02721       Freez(fileGenderReader);
02722       Freez(noGenderCalls);
02723       Freez(noInbredReader);
02724       Freez(celStats);
02725 
02726       if(m_FreeChipLayout) {
02727         Freez(m_ChipLayout);
02728         for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_ProbesetNames.size(); i++) {
02729             FreezArray(m_ProbesetNames[i]);
02730         }
02731         m_ProbesetNames.clear();
02732       }
02733       if(!Util::sameString(getOpt("probeset-ids"),"")) {
02734           for(uint32_t i = 0; i < toRunProbesets.size(); i++) {
02735               FreezArray(toRunProbesets[i]);
02736           }
02737       }
02738       toRunProbesets.clear();
02739       Freez(iMart);
02740       closeGlobalA5();
02741       removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
02742 
02743       /// @todo reporters and main chip summary generater not freed
02744 
02745       // re-throw the unchanged exception.
02746       throw;
02747     }
02748   } // outer try end
02749   /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
02750   catch(Except &e) {
02751     Verbose::out(0,"");
02752     Err::errAbort(e.what());
02753   }
02754   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
02755     Verbose::out(0,"");
02756     Err::errAbort("Ran out of memory. "
02757                   "Try quitting other applications.");
02758   }
02759   catch(CalvinException &ce) {
02760     Verbose::out(0,"");
02761     Err::errAbort("Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
02762                   "Description: '" +StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()) + "'");
02763   }
02764   catch(BroadException &e) {
02765     Verbose::out(0,"");
02766     Err::errAbort("Exception. msg: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
02767                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
02768   }
02769   catch(const std::exception &e) {
02770     Verbose::out(0,"");
02771     Err::errAbort("Exception caught. "
02772                   "Most problems with this program are memory related. "
02773                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
02774   }
02775   catch(const BaseException &e) {
02776     Verbose::out(0,"");
02777     Err::errAbort("newmat issue: " + ToStr(e.what()));
02778   }
02779   catch(...) {
02780     Verbose::out(0,"");
02781     Err::errAbort("Unknown exception caught "
02782                   "(most problems with this program are memory related).");
02783   }
02784 
02785   // cleanup -- KEEP IN SYNC WITH MEMORY FREEZ ABOVE IN CATCH
02786   ///@todo leaking probeSetToReport
02787   Freez(precompSeeds);
02788   Freez(dmCaller);
02789   Freez(emCelListener);
02790   Freez(cnProbeCelListener);
02791   Freez(fileGenderReader);
02792   Freez(noGenderCalls);
02793   Freez(noInbredReader);
02794   Freez(celStats);
02795   Freez(iMart);
02796   
02797   if(m_FreeChipLayout) {
02798      Freez(m_ChipLayout);
02799     for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_ProbesetNames.size(); i++) {
02800         FreezArray(m_ProbesetNames[i]);
02801     }
02802     m_ProbesetNames.clear();
02803   }
02804   if(!Util::sameString(getOpt("probeset-ids"),"")) {
02805       for(uint32_t i = 0; i < toRunProbesets.size(); i++) {
02806           FreezArray(toRunProbesets[i]);
02807       }
02808   }
02809   toRunProbesets.clear();
02810   closeGlobalA5();
02811   removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
02812   
02813   /// @todo reporters and main chip summary generater not freed
02814 
02815 }
02816 
02817 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::closeGlobalA5() {
02818   // A5 close global groups
02819   if (m_a5_global_output_group!=NULL) {
02820     m_a5_global_output_group->close();
02821     delete m_a5_global_output_group;
02822     m_a5_global_output_group=NULL;
02823   }
02824   if (m_a5_global_input_group!=NULL) {
02825     m_a5_global_input_group->close();
02826     delete m_a5_global_input_group;
02827     m_a5_global_input_group=NULL;
02828   }
02829 
02830   // A5 close global files
02831   if(m_a5_global_output_file != m_a5_global_input_file) {
02832     affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_output_file);
02833     affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_input_file);
02834   } else {
02835     affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_output_file);
02836     m_a5_global_input_file = NULL;
02837   }
02838 }
02839 
02840 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
02841       map<string,string>::iterator iter;
02842       out << endl << "Standard Methods:" << endl;
02843       unsigned int maxLength = 0;
02844       for(iter = m_stdMethods.begin(); iter != m_stdMethods.end(); iter++) {
02845         if(iter->first.size() > maxLength)
02846           maxLength = iter->first.size();
02847       }
02848       for(iter = m_stdMethods.begin(); iter != m_stdMethods.end(); iter++) {
02849         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
02850         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
02851         currentLength = iter->first.size();
02852         while(currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
02853           out.put(' ');
02854           currentLength++;
02855         }
02856         out << iter->second << endl;
02857       }
02858 }
02859 
02860 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::TsvReportFmt_t report_format,
02861                             AnalysisInfo& info,
02862                             QuantGTypeMethod *qMethod,
02863                             AnalysisStream *as,
02864                             vector<ChipSummary *> &chipSummaries,
02865                             GenderCalls *gender,
02866                             std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToReport,
02867                                                      bool doCompact) {
02868   //
02869   if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ) || InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBRLMM) || InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBirdseed)) {
02870     QuantExprMethod *eMethod = NULL;
02871     if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)) {
02872       eMethod = static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod)->getQuantExprMethod();
02873     } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBRLMM)) {
02874       eMethod = static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod)->getQuantExprMethod();
02875     } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBirdseed)) {
02876       eMethod = static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod)->getQuantExprMethod();
02877     }
02878 
02879     QuantMethodExprReport *report = new QuantMethodExprReport(info.getNumCols());
02880     report->m_qMethod=as->getQuantMethod();
02881     report->setIsHeaderBuffer(1);
02882     report->setDirPath(getOpt("out-dir"));
02883     report->m_qMethod=eMethod;
02884     report->setPrecision(5);
02885     report->setWriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile(getOptBool("writeOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile"));
02886 
02887     // We do not do this for the expression reporters as output
02888     // is controlled by the quant method. If you set this then
02889     // nothing will be reported as the probeset names reported
02890     // have the extra allele and context stuff appended.
02891     //report->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
02892     if(getOptBool("include-quant-in-report-file-name"))
02893         report->setFileprefix(as->getName()+"."+eMethod->getType());
02894     else
02895         report->setFileprefix(as->getName());
02896     report->setFilename("QuantMethodExprReport-DEBUG"); // filename not used -- for debugging
02897 
02898     if(report_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV) {
02899         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("summaries");
02900         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("feat-details");
02901         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("feat-effects");
02902     } else {
02903         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("a5-summaries");
02904         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("a5-feature-details");
02905         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("a5-feature-effects");
02906         
02907         if(getOptBool("a5-summaries-use-global")) {
02908             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02909                 Err::errAbort("--a5-summaries-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02910             report->m_summary_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
02911             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for allele summary output.");
02912         }
02913     
02914         if(getOptBool("a5-feature-details-use-global")) {
02915             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02916                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-details-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02917             report->m_residuals_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
02918             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for residuals output.");
02919         }
02920     
02921         if(getOptBool("a5-feature-effects-use-global")) {
02922             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02923                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-effects-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02924             report->m_feffects_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
02925             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for feature effects output.");
02926         }
02927     }
02928 
02929     report->setFormat(report_format);
02930     if(doCompact && report_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {
02931       report->setCompactFile5Format(info.m_MaxPsNameLength + 2);
02932     }
02933     report->addStdHeaders(report,
02934                           getOpt("exec-guid"),
02935                           as->getGuid(),
02936                           getOpt("time-start"),
02937                           getOpt("command-line"),
02938                           getOpt("version-to-report"),
02939                           info);
02940 
02941     if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)) {
02942       static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
02943     } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBRLMM)) {
02944       static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
02945     } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBirdseed)) {
02946       static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
02947     }
02948   }
02949 }
02950 
02951 void ProbesetGenotypeStageEngine::addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::TsvReportFmt_t report_format,
02952                                                           AnalysisInfo& info,
02953                                                           std::vector<QuantMethodReport *> &exprReporters,
02954                                                           vector<ChipSummary *> &chipSummaries,
02955                                                           GenderCalls *gender,
02956                                                           std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> *probeSetsToReport,
02957                                                           bool doCompact) {
02958   //
02959 
02960     QuantMethodExprReport *report = new QuantMethodExprReport(info.getNumCols());
02961     report->setIsHeaderBuffer(1);
02962     report->setDirPath(getOpt("out-dir"));
02963     //    report->m_qMethod=eMethod;
02964     report->setPrecision(5);
02965     report->setWriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile(getOptBool("writeOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile"));
02966 
02967     // We do not do this for the expression reporters as output
02968     // is controlled by the quant method. If you set this then
02969     // nothing will be reported as the probeset names reported
02970     // have the extra allele and context stuff appended.
02971     //report->registerProbeSetsToReport(probeSetsToReport);
02972     if(getOptBool("include-quant-in-report-file-name"))
02973       report->setFileprefix(info.m_AnalysisName+".emethod");
02974     else
02975         report->setFileprefix(info.m_AnalysisName);
02976     report->setFilename("QuantMethodExprReport-DEBUG"); // filename not used -- for debugging
02977 
02978     if(report_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV) {
02979         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("summaries");
02980         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("feat-details");
02981         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("feat-effects");
02982     } else {
02983         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("a5-summaries");
02984         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("a5-feature-details");
02985         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("a5-feature-effects");
02986         
02987         if(getOptBool("a5-summaries-use-global")) {
02988             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02989                 Err::errAbort("--a5-summaries-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02990             report->m_summary_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
02991             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for allele summary output.");
02992         }
02993     
02994         if(getOptBool("a5-feature-details-use-global")) {
02995             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
02996                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-details-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
02997             report->m_residuals_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
02998             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for residuals output.");
02999         }
03000     
03001         if(getOptBool("a5-feature-effects-use-global")) {
03002             if(m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
03003                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-effects-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
03004             report->m_feffects_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
03005             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for feature effects output.");
03006         }
03007     }
03008 
03009     report->setFormat(report_format);
03010     if(doCompact && report_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {
03011       report->setCompactFile5Format(info.m_MaxPsNameLength + 2);
03012     }
03013     report->addStdHeaders(report,
03014                           getOpt("exec-guid"),
03015                           info.m_AnalysisGuid,
03016                           getOpt("time-start"),
03017                           getOpt("command-line"),
03018                           getOpt("version-to-report"),
03019                           info);
03020 
03021   //   if(InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantLabelZ)) {
03022   //     static_cast<QuantLabelZ *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
03023   //   } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBRLMM)) {
03024   //     static_cast<QuantBRLMM *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
03025   //   } else if (InstanceOf(qMethod,QuantBirdseed)) {
03026   //     static_cast<QuantBirdseed *>(qMethod)->addExprReporter(report);
03027   //   }
03028   // }
03029     exprReporters.push_back(report);
03030 }
